name: how to knit: swedish raggsocks
notes:
**free pattern!** 
do you want to learn how to knit raggsocks, or raggsockor in swedish? this pattern is a part of our learn how to knit-series: easy to follow patterns and videos that guide you through knitting step by step, clearly demonstrating every important point on the way.
